Title: Relates to the use of transportation management brokers
Summary: Establishes that providers of adult day health care and managed long term care plans may elect to use transportation management brokers; provides that programs of all-inclusive care for the elderly (PACE) are not required to use transportation management brokers.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-h, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the use of transportation management brokers
